roleset.name: for use in grading/digging/ground-shaping operations
roleset.note: EARTHMOVING-N, EARTHMOVING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: earthmoving-j
example.text: The Guihulngan mayor, Ernesto Reyes, said crews were using earthmoving equipment in the search for casualties.

roleset.name: of great significance
roleset.note: EARTHMOVING-N, EARTHMOVING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: earthmoving-j
example.text: In the meantime enjoy the little lighthearted things â€” we can get back to talking about heavy, earthmoving things when I feel up to it.
